entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Review and update `ryujit-tutorial.md` #69988
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] System.Linq.Expression.Tests - add CallSite to rd.xml #69985
  • Codegen optimization of `(a << 4) | (b >> 4)` #69983
    Future
  • LogValues[int] throws new IndexOutOfRangeException(message: nameof(index)) #69981
  • How can I declare an interop COM interface as "agile"? #69979
  • [QUIC] Support for OpenSSL build of MsQuic on Windows #69978
    Future
  • Test failure LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Diagnostics.StringMarshallingForwardingNotSupported_ReportsDiagnostic #69977
  • Test failure JIT\\Intrinsics\\TypeIntrinsics_r\\TypeIntrinsics_r.cmd #69976

Closed

  • [release/7.0-preview5] Assertion failure in interpreter on v8/windows: `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:3440` #69868
  • Regressions in BenchmarksGame.RegexRedux_1 #65716
    7.0.0
  • JIT: PGO-based block reordering interferes with loop recognition #67318
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\superpmi\\superpmicollect\\Bytemark\\Bytemark.cmd #69974
  • Unsafe.As being intrinsic has exposed a few JIT related issues #69505
    7.0.0
  • Optimize Vector128<T> equality against Zero/AllBitsSet #55343
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Fold type checks with GDV #52370
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Test timeout: ResponseCancellation_BothCancellationTokenAndDispose_Success #56265
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] SendStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_Succeeds times out #56000
    Future
  • ProxyTunnelRequest_OriginServerSendsProxyAuthChallenge_NoProxyAuthPerformed hung/slow #68531
    7.0.0
  • ClientAndServer_OneOrBothUseDefault_Ok failed in CI with ObjectDisposedException #30724
    7.0.0
  • Trialing an Automated Issue Cleanup Experiment #60288
    7.0.0
  • Fix ConnectTest.ConnectAsync_PassNoSubProtocol_ServerRequires_ThrowsWebSocketException on NodeJS #63681
    7.0.0
  • Fix ConnectTest.ConnectAsync_CancellationRequestedAfterConnect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException on NodeJS #63671
    7.0.0
  • `impNormStructVal`'s `OBJ(ADDR(LCL_VAR))` wrapping logic can be too permissive #69965
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonSerializerOptions available via Action #69972
  • Crossgen2 has been failing to load 'Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native' #69743
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.5.22257.3] MaxInteger[T](System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[T])' violates the constraint of type parameter 'T' exception error #69119

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not use `LEA`s in HIR #69992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete a few dependencies on field sequences #69991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix building with clang 14 #69990
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Clean up emitOutputNOP #69989
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `Random.XoshiroImpl` in the thread pool's hill climbing RNG. #69987
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Avoid discarding upper bits when folding GT_SWITCH #69986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure we remorph tree with changed child node fully #69984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect BigInteger multiply result for -a * a #69982
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add static default interface methods smoke test #69973
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix invocation of finally clauses with tiering enabled #69909
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: defer some flow graph reordering until after loop recognition #69878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the segment fault for `writeableOffset`. #69975
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the segment fault within JIT_UpdateWriteBarrierState. #69782
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Move constant vectors to op2 from op1 #67502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1796274 #69932
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete a dead rationalizer transform #69958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use the signature's struct handle for making outgoing arg copies #69971
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add issue cleanup documentation and update automation #69857
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Process WebSocket connection errors on NodeJS #69858
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix setting of DacpHeapSegmentData::highAllocMark on DAC side. #69670
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add the repro case for race condition in revisit_written_pages as a GC test case #69496
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Change dispenser policy for RuntimeAssembly to ReuseAlways #69937
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
    area-System.Runtime
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Split out and generalize tailcall IR validation/tailcall profile adjustments #69941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rev .NET 5 to net6.0 or $(NetCoreAppCurrent) #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support array parameter types of custom attributes in Mono AOT compiler #69759
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Optimize Array.GetFlattenedIndex (all runtimes) and InternalGetValue (CoreCLR) #69940
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0] Fix singlefile bundle alignment on OSX ARM64 #69930
    area-Single-File, 6.0.x
  • Change wording of exception #69957
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_INDEX` #69917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable Expression tests for NativeAOT #69945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix diamond pattern encountered with static virtual interface methods #69738
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Speed up Convert.ToBase64String() #69884
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Update CentOS7 image #69892
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Store actual signature types in CallArg and normalize to that type #69969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cryptography.Xml.Tests: skip tests that require rsa+sha1 when platform doesn't support it. #69713
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugging] Adding instructions for native debugging #69873
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm-ep] Implement EventSource counters support; add an EventPipeSessionOptions builder to TS #69567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • handle SECURITY_STATUS 0x80090016 #69942
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • PoC: support custom X509ChainPolicy in SslStream #69908
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [NativeAot] Null ref return is wrapped in TargetInvocationException #69838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet sln add` replaces space indentation with tabs #25707
  • With VS 16.9.22 installed, Warning MSB3101: Could not write state file "obj\Debug\net*\a.csprojAssemblyReference.cache". ... display when building 3.1/5.0 project in CLI. #25698

PullRequests

Created

  • Add --skip-sign-check option to repair, uninstall, and update #25699
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

Updated

  • Syntax_Provider_Doesnt_Attribute_Incorrect_Timing flaky on MacOS #61474

  • Flaky Compiler server test: ReferenceCachingCS #19763
    17.3
  • [Flaky test] GoToImplementationOpensProvisionalTabIfDocumentNotOpen #60071
    17.3
  • FixAllOccurrencesIgnoresGeneratedCode is flaky #56625
    17.2
  • MacOS Failure to Restore with signature validation issue #58202
    17.3
  • InitializeToolset flakiness in correctness builds #58199
    17.3
  • NuGet.Protocol.Core.Types.FatalProtocolException exception in helix work items #58197
    17.3
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CommandLine.UnitTests.CommandLineTests.ArgumentParsing is flaky #58077
    Backlog
  • Failure in CSharpCodeActions.GFUFuzzyMatchAfterRenameTrackingAndAfterGenerateType #57423
  • CI build fails due to Azure package feed error 503 (Service Unavailable) #57565
  • Timeout on Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.CSharp.UnitTests.dll tests #55638
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    17.3
  • Need 'fix-all' for naming style violations. #14983
    17.3
  • Refactor: move static method to other class #33928
    Backlog
  • Source Generators: Allow embedding of files other than source #49935
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Add collapsedText to foldingRange #61590

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61583

  • Add unit test project IVT to ExternalAccess.AspNetCore #61588

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IHostingEnvironment.WebRootPath is not nullable but can be null #41929
  • [.NET 7] Blazor debug host does fails to start #41927
  • At random intervals the application fails to set RouteValues #41924
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor question, will navigating to same page *always* reuse the same page component #41922
  • Minimal APIs can generate invalid IL when returning Spans #41920
  • Consider adding Text overloads to support UTF8 text #41919

Closed

  • Cannot have colocated javascript when using typescript and asp.net razor pages app. #41921
  • Build-time Razor HTML generation #41923

PullRequests

Created

  • adds kiota to dotnet openapi tool #41928
    community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8d51dc5` to `9d21db9` #41926
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [SignalR] Update some npm deps #41270
    area-signalr
  • Update duende versions to 6.1 #41896
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CaptureVideoAsync always returning null when using Windows Machine #7616
  • [Android] Pushing TabbedPage from Shell-based ContentPage causes Platform Handler exception. #7615
  • iOS CollectionView selects Items SelectionMode="None" #7614
  • ContentView inherits from the wrong base Layout class #7613
  • Border controls can't set stroke thickness with granularity for each side #7612
  • Binding relative source type intellisense only shows classes with default constructor #7608
  • ScrollView inside a Grid with multiple Rows and Columns not working #7607
  • HasBackButton not removing back button #7604
  • Bug with Hot Reload : Different layout screen without applying any modification to it #7603
  • Splashscreen not showing in Windows #7602
  • Color button DisplayAlert box in dark theme on android not readable. #7601
  • Blazor App Menu not rendered in IOS #7600
  • Windows Embedded Font in new handler #7598
  • Can we separate button Opacity as each part of button has own Opacity, like Background-Opacity, Text-Opacity, BorderColor-Opacity, ImageOpacity? #7597

Closed

  • MAUI on Big Sur with Xcode 12 #7572
  • Support the Mac Idiom for Mac Catalyst apps #7559
  • [Android] Some DevExpress DevControl issues in the .NET MAUI 1.0 #7599
  • RadioButtonGroup - MAUI Crash on Release InvalidCastException #7347
  • [BUG] GA Fix Source Generation for when Adding new Maui Pages as still using old Stack Layout and not VerticalStackLayout #7424
  • Running the ListViewDemo on win 11 gets Win32 unhandled exception, fatal error #7344
  • Not able to create Msix file for an application with a custom library referred directly #7268
  • .NET Multi-platform App UI development #7565
  • WSA Using Advanced Network Is Ignored by Visual Studio. #7591

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry
  • [iOS] Fix issue updating Slider Maximum value #7610
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, control-slider, 6.0.300-servicing
  • [iOS] Fix ActivityIndicator with initial IsRunning value to False #7609
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, control-activityindicator, 6.0.300-servicing

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22274.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22277.2 #7606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.Memory from 4.5.4 to 4.5.5 #7533
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Just a small styling error I noticed just now #7519
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Avoid crash with invalid cast using RadioButtonGroup.GroupName with a View #7438
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Align the controls used in the different templates #7439
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.3xx-sr1

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix cell size changed on CollectionView #7447
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.8 to 4.13.2 #7532
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Command Timeout doesn't set sqlite3_busy_timeout #28135
  • EF Core 6 - Unable to translate a collection subquery in a projection #28130
  • Model building perf regression #28129
  • The LINQ expression 'ProjectionBindingExpression: 0/1/2' could not be translated. #28125
  • Strict mode tables not working, syntax error #28124

Closed

  • 'OnConfiguring' cannot be used to modify DbContextOptions when DbContext pooling is enabled. #28123
  • Cosmos: Translate regex matching #28078
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.27.0 to 3.27.1 #28134
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.0-pre20220427180151 to 2.1.0 #28133
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.1.0-pre20220427180151 to 2.1.0 #28132
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 from 2.1.0-pre20220427180151 to 2.1.0 #28131
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add instantiation binding interception and use it for proxies #28127

Merged

  • Cosmos: Add translator for Regex.IsMatch method #28121
